verses.verse: וַיַּעַל֩ <S%H5927><s%> went up אַבְרָ֨ם <S%H87><s%> And Abram מִמִּצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt ה֠וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאִשְׁתּ֧וֹ <S%H802><s%> he and his wife וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֛וֹ וְל֥וֹט <S%H3876><s%> and all that he had and Lot עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with הַנֶּֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> with him into the south

וְאַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> And Abram כָּבֵ֣ד <S%H3513><s%> rich מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [was] very בַּמִּקְנֶ֕ה <S%H4735><s%> in cattle בַּכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> in silver וּבַזָּהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> and in gold

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went לְמַסָּעָ֔יו <S%H4550><s%> on his journeys מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> from the south וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> even to Bethel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הָ֨יָה <S%H1961><s%> had been שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> in it [אָהֳלֹה כ] (אָֽהֳלֹו֙ <S%H168><s%> tent ק) בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <S%H8462><s%> at the beginning בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> and Hai

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> Unto the place הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> which he had made שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> there at the first וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> called שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> and there Abram בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> on the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also לְל֔וֹט <S%H3876><s%> And Lot הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> also which went אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אַבְרָ֑ם <S%H87><s%> Abram הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had צֹאן־ <S%H6629><s%> had flocks וּבָקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> and herds וְאֹהָלִֽים׃ <S%H168><s%> and tents

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> was not able to bear אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> them that they might dwell יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become רְכוּשָׁם֙ <S%H7399><s%> for their substance רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> was great וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> were not יָֽכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> so that they could לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> not dwell יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was רִ֗יב <S%H7379><s%> And there was a strife בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between רֹעֵ֣י <S%H7473><s%> shipherd מִקְנֵֽה־ <S%H4735><s%> cattle אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> of Abram's וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between רֹעֵ֣י <S%H7473><s%> shipherd מִקְנֵה־ <S%H4735><s%> cattle ל֑וֹט <S%H3876><s%> of Lot's וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzite אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> then יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> dwelled בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> then in the land

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָ֜ם <S%H87><s%> And Abram אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to ל֗וֹט <S%H3876><s%> unto Lot אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> Please תְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> Let there be מְרִיבָה֙ <S%H4808><s%> strife בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between רֹעַ֖י <S%H7473><s%> shipherd וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between רֹעֶ֑יךָ <S%H7473><s%> shipherd כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> we אַחִ֖ים <S%H251><s%> [be] brethren אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> ourselves

הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> is not כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> [Is] not the whole land לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before הִפָּ֥רֶד <S%H6504><s%> separate נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> Please מֵעָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> and אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הַשְּׂמֹ֣אל <S%H8040><s%> I pray thee from me if [thou wilt take] the left hand וְאֵימִ֔נָה <S%H3231><s%> then I will go to the right וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הַיָּמִ֖ין <S%H3225><s%> or if [thou depart] to the right hand וְאַשְׂמְאִֽילָה׃ <S%H8041><s%> then I will go to the left

וַיִּשָּׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> lifted up ל֣וֹט <S%H3876><s%> And Lot אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> and beheld אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כִּכַּ֣ר <S%H3603><s%> all the plain הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כֻלָּ֖הּ <S%H3605><s%> everywhere מַשְׁקֶ֑ה <S%H4945><s%> that it [was] well watered לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> every where before שַׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> destroyed יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סְדֹם֙ <S%H5467><s%> Sodom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמֹרָ֔ה <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah כְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> [even] as the garden יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> like the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בֹּאֲכָ֖ה <S%H935><s%> as thou comest צֹֽעַר׃ <S%H6820><s%> unto Zoar

וַיִּבְחַר־ <S%H977><s%> chose ל֣וֹ ל֗וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Then Lot אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כִּכַּ֣ר <S%H3603><s%> him all the plain הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan וַיִּסַּ֥ע <S%H5265><s%> journeyed ל֖וֹט <S%H3876><s%> and Lot מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> east וַיִּפָּ֣רְד֔וּ <S%H6504><s%> and they separated themselves אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the one מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> from the other

אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> Abram יָשַׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> dwelled בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וְל֗וֹט <S%H3876><s%> and Lot יָשַׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> dwelled בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities הַכִּכָּ֔ר <S%H3603><s%> of the plain וַיֶּאֱהַ֖ל <S%H167><s%> and pitched [his] tent עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> toward סְדֹֽם׃ <S%H5467><s%> Sodom

וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> now the men סְדֹ֔ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom רָעִ֖ים <S%H7451><s%> [were] wicked וְחַטָּאִ֑ים <S%H2400><s%> and sinners לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> before the LORD מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> exceedingly

וַֽיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> unto Abram אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הִפָּֽרֶד־ <S%H6504><s%> was separated ל֣וֹט <S%H3876><s%> that Lot מֵֽעִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> from him Lift up נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Now עֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> now thine eyes וּרְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and look מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> from the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> in it צָפֹ֥נָה <S%H6828><s%> where thou art northward וָנֶ֖גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> and southward וָקֵ֥דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> and eastward וָיָֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> and westward

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> For all the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you רֹאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> which thou seest לְךָ֣ אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <S%H5414><s%> to thee will I give it וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> and to thy seed עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <S%H7760><s%> And I will make אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed כַּעֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> as the dust הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> so that אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> can אִ֗ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another לִמְנוֹת֙ <S%H4487><s%> number אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> the dust הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth גַּֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> also זַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> [then] shall thy seed יִמָּנֶֽה׃ <S%H4487><s%> also be numbered

ק֚וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise הִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through the land לְאָרְכָּ֖הּ <S%H753><s%> in the length וּלְרָחְבָּ֑הּ <S%H7341><s%> of it and in the breadth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לְךָ֖ אֶתְּנֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5414><s%> of it for I will give

וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ל <S%H167><s%> removed [his] tent אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> Then Abram וַיָּבֹ֛א <S%H935><s%> and came וַיֵּ֛שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בְּאֵלֹנֵ֥י <S%H436><s%> in the plain מַמְרֵ֖א <S%H4471><s%> of Mamre אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> which [is] in Hebron וַיִּֽבֶן־ <S%H1129><s%> and built שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> and there מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> there an altar לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ
